message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This way we both benefit from ending the game early and avoid losing money to inflation.
Your offer was a bit too one-sided, Alice. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  Let's be realistic - you lose more with each round than I do.  Take it while it's still a good deal for you.
Bob, let's stop playing games. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly.  Each round that passes hurts us both, and this ensures we both get a guaranteed, reasonable share.
